channel.title: Regina Souza on mowery.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Regina Souza on mowery.dev

item.title: Beef Veggie Soup
item.description: Ingredients Instructions Cook meet (cubed stew meat, or beef shank) with grated (in food processor) carrots, celery, onions and garlic (to taste, ha-ha-ha). Add salt. Wait until the broth begins to boil again Cook for 10 minutes Add sweet potatoes and butternut squash and cook for another 15 minutes Add green beans and cook for another 8-10 minutes or until the softness desired

item.title: Candied Orange and Lemon Peel
item.description: Original Prep Time: 20 mins Cook Time: 45 mins Total Time: 1 hr 5 mins Ingredients Note Yields approximately 8 ounces of candied citrus peel depending on peel thickness. 3 Valencia or Naval oranges and 4 lemons (can also use the equivalent of grapefruits, Meyer lemons and limes, or any citrus of your choice, thoroughly washed and scrubbed (as citrus is highly sprayed, I recommend using organic) 2 cups sugar 1 cup water Fine granulated sugar for coating Instructions Slice both ends of the citrus fruits.

item.title: Stollen
item.description: Ingredients Dough 1 cup milk 1 egg 4 Tbsp butter 3 1/4 cups flour 1/2 cup (brown) sugar 1 tsp salt 1/2 tsp baking powder 1 1/2 tsp dry yeast Fruit and nuts 1/2 cup golden raisins 1/2 cup (3/4 cup) slivered almonds 1/2 cup candied fruit lemon zest (finely shredded peel) (optional) orange zest (finely shredded peel) (optional) Instructions Note Using the sweet cycle of the bread machine (mine does the dough cycle in 1:20 min).

item.title: Broiled Salmon
item.description: The Marinade 3 Tb minced onions (or scallions, or shallots) 1 1/2 Tb soy sauce 2 Tb olive oil 1/2 tsp rosemary (ground rosemary) 1 Tb rosemary to sprinkle Big pinch pepper or drops of Tabasco Black pepper (optional) The juice of 1/2 lemon A broiling pan Instructions Mix the marinade ingredients in a bowl (I run it through the food processor). Lay the salmon flat in the bottom of your broiling pan and spread on half the marinade.

item.title: French Toast
item.description: Info This recipe involves leaving the bread in the fridge overnight, plan accordingly Equipment Requires a large pan (10x15) Ingredients 6 Le Petit Outre Kaiser Rolls (top and bottom crust removed) 6 eggs 2 cups of milk 3/8 cup sugar 1/2 tsp salt 1 Tbsp Vanilla 2 Tbsp Butter (cut into thin slices) Cinnamon (to taste) Instructions Grease pan; place the bread Beat eggs, sugar, salt, vanilla Pour the mixture on the bread Leave overnight in fridge Turn the bread around (so the top gets moister) Sprinkle Cinnamon Put thin slices of butter on top Bake for about 40 minutes (to an hour) on 350 F (325 F if on a glass dish)

item.title: Goulash
item.description: Original Ingredients Broth 2 lb Beef chuck 1 ts Salt 4 potatoes; Peeled and diced 2 Tbsp paprika 2 Tbsp olive oil 1/4 ts Black pepper 2 Bay Leaves 1 qt Water 2 onions Egg dumpling batter 1 Egg 6 tb Flour 1/8 tsp Salt Instructions Broth Cut beef into 1 inch squares, add 1/2 tsp. salt. Chop onions and brown in oil, add beef and paprika. Let beef simmer in its own juice along with salt and paprika for 1 hr.

item.title: Green Beans
item.description: Ingredients The ingredients below do not have quantities. Use amounts that you find tasty Minced garlic (to taste) Red pepper flakes (to taste) (optional) toasted sesame seeds Extra virgin olive oil Sesame oil (a little goes a long way) Green beans Soy sauce (diluted in water so it’s not so strong) Instructions Saute minced garlic, red pepper flakes, and optionally toasted sesame seeds in a generous amount of extra virgin olive oil and bit of sesame oil Stir fry the green beans.

item.title: Cheese bread (p√£o de queijo)
item.description: Equipment Mini Muffin tins Notes When using a shitty blender make 2/3 Ingredients 3 eggs 1 cup oil (bland) 1 cup milk 1/2 tablespoon salt 1.5 cups parmesan cheese 3 cups tapioca flour Instructions Grease mini muffin tin Mix liquid ingredients in blender Mix in dry ingredients Fill 2/3 of each mini muffin tin with batter Bake for 20-25 minutes at 350 degrees
